Name: Marcos Rafael
description: Marcos is 23 years old. He is single. He lives with his mother in the municipality of Cucuyagua, Copan. He buys and sells honey from the beehive. He has already been doing this work for 5 years, and it is his main source of income. He sells the honey at his house, via orders, and at a stand in the local market. Marcos is asking for 10,000 lempiras in order to buy gallons of honey and bottles to package the honey and sell it to his customers that way. His goal is to improve himself financially through his business and to strengthen it more.
